summary: The Sprint Planning Architect clarified the step-by-step process for addressing the client's confusion about app cleanup, proposing a new user story US-017 to migrate from Supabase to local SQLite, consolidate routes, and enable testing, while outlining a sprint SP-003 for execution pending client approval.

decisions.title: Propose New User Story US-017
decisions.details: Add US-017 to backlog for Local SQLite Migration & App Consolidation, including removal of Supabase, SQLite setup, route consolidation, seeding data, and basic testing.

decisions.title: Propose Sprint SP-003
decisions.details: Sprint includes US-017, US-010, and US-001 to fix app runtime issues and create a testable local foundation.

actions.task: Reply with 'yes' to confirm goal or tweaks, and 'approve SP-003' to proceed with sprint execution.
Add US-017 to backlog and trigger sprint execution upon client approval.

risks.risk: Potential issues with dependencies or execution generating incorrect code.
risks.mitigation: Re-plan a follow-up sprint if issues arise post-execution; test manually after generation.

risks.risk: Client goals may need tweaking before proceeding.
risks.mitigation: Confirm goal in Step 1 and adjust story/sprint based on client feedback.
